import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Tab, Nav, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Conversations from './Conversations' import Contacts from './Contacts' const CONVERSATIONS_KEY = 'conversations' const CONTACTS_KEY = 'contactsd' export default function Sidebar({ id }) { const [activeKey, setActiveKey] = useState(CONVERSATIONS_KEY) const conversationsOpen = activeKey === CONVERSATIONS_KEY return (
Conversations Contacts
Your Id:
{id}
) }
